Content: I was thinking if alternative to dPOW could work using CC? Steps: 1. network detect hashrate jump > 30% 2. additional backup miners are run to counter weight the jump (suspected 51% started) or even 3. buying mining power online to counter the jump. Even is possible to act this way "automatically" question of price ...

Author: passcombo.com üè¥‚ò†üçã#0622
Content: To sum up - detecting hashrate jump - expect attack, increase hashrate to counter the attacker. This should be temporary action. Acting this way should discourage attackers?

Content:
hmmmmmm....yes well.   thanks for the comments and feedback you've relayed @Buddz1993 because these are fundamental understandings that need to be considered by marketing team(s) seeking to educate users - where the thinking or one aspect slightly incorrectly makes further assumptions plain wrong.
like maths.  the mistake is carried forward.
